page.title: 15SMART'S FARM LONGHOPE.
page.content: We interviewed{Cerie Smart}from Longhope Primary School who told us about his fathers farm.It is called {'BARN FARM'}and covers 100 acres of land.It has 1000 sheep and over 50 beef cattle. His pets include 2 ducks, 4 chickens,2 cockerels,a hen and chicks, a cat, a rabbit and 2 sheepdogs. They don't sell any of the eggs they produce, they are just for their own use. Apart from his Mother,sister and himself, his father employs a man to help during the week and a boy at weekends. They use 2 tractors, ploughs, bailers and all the other necessary farm equipment. Also part of his land is taken up by plums, cider apples and perry pears in their orchards.
